ðŸ“– Summary: GPUStack is an open-source GPU cluster manager designed to simplify the deployment and scaling of AI models. It offers broad hardware and model compatibility, supports distributed inference, and provides OpenAI-compatible APIs. Key features include user management, GPU monitoring, and token usage tracking, all within a lightweight Python package.
